events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for a software engineer role.
A recruiter has been assigned to your application and will assist you through the next steps of the hiring process.
We completed the initial screening of your profile and you meet the basic requirements for our software engineering position.
Thank you for your prompt reply with availability for the technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-10 at 10 AM UTC with our lead developer.
You completed the technical interview successfully; the panel was impressed with your problem-solving skills.
Your HR interview is scheduled for 2024-05-15 at 3 PM UTC to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
The HR interview concluded positively, and we believe you would be a great addition to our engineering team.
An offer has been proposed, detailing salary, benefits, and starting date for the software engineer position.
We received your feedback expressing enthusiasm for the offer and requesting some clarification on the benefits package.
You accepted the job offer, confirming your start date and expressing excitement to join the engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started, including accounts setup, welcome sessions, and initial training.
The hiring process is complete, and you have officially joined our engineering team as a software engineer.
